title: BatteryMINDer 12 Volt 2/4/8 Amp Wet/Gel/AGM Battery Charger

FREE battery condition indicator  (1.95 retail value) , with instant pushbutton LED read-out, when you  register your warranty  on the manufacturer's web site. Included with every package!                 The BatteryMINDer automatically dissolves power-robbing sulphation crystals using safe, low voltage, high frequency U.S. Patented pulse technology    This unit comes with clips, round eyelets only.
